post.author: The Happy Friar
post.body: There's only 1 on moddb.com, so i'm wondering where all the prey mods are hiding. My FTP source seems to be gone (bummer).

post.author: bkt
post.body: I've got a niggling feeling that there aren't m/any.

post.author: efx
post.body: That's somewhat strange. It sold really well actually so it's a bit sad to see someone not trying to expand on it.

post.author: Regulator
post.body: Yeah that was surprising, just like the lack of FEAR sp mods.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
I found a few here, but there's not much available.

http://forums.3drealms.com/vb/forumdisplay.php?f=41

post.author: AnthonyJa
post.body:
efx wrote:
That's somewhat strange. It sold really well actually so it's a bit sad to see someone not trying to expand on it.


Pretty much nobody plays it online though, so unless they're SP mods theres just nobody interested in it at all.
